nodes.text: Frozencavern Canyon was an ice ravine in the northeastern corner of the Tomb, an ancient Rakata prison on the planet Belsavis.The deep caverns, frozen transport center, and the Rakata machine caves were all located in the canyon, and it was linked to the Ancient Stasis Zone by a passageway carved into the western wall of the ravine.
Frozencavern Canyon is a location in the Tomb on the planet Belsavis in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic.
